channel.title: Making LD client fullscreen help? [READ AND REPLY TO MAYBE BENEFIT OTHERS]
channel.description:
hey moparscapers, just wondering if you can make a LD client fullscreen? maybe you put some stuff from a HD fullscreen client into a LD one, that might work? if so please email me at beanburrito1@hotmail.co.uk. :)
thanks for your help (if you choose to do so)
b13age

item.title: Making LD client fullscreen help? [READ AND REPLY TO MAYBE BENEFIT OTHERS]

item.description:
@b13AGE wrote:

there must be a way, surely! maybe if the client is built like a HD client but is coded differently, or something is added to a LD client therefore making it fullscreen? i mean, it has to be possible
